content.en: COVID-19 forecasting: Scientists have been using various machine learning algorithms to predict and forecast the spread of COVID-19. These algorithms, such as Support Vector Machines, Linear Regression, Random Forest, and Artificial Neural Networks, are being employed to analyze data and make predictions about the number of cases, trends, and even the end of the pandemic. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers hope to gain insights that can help in managing and controlling the outbreak more effectively.
content.da: COVID-19 prognoser: Forskere har brugt forskellige maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige og forudse spredningen af COVID-19. Disse algoritmer, såsom Support Vector Machines, Lineær Regression, Random Forest og Kunstige Neurale Netværk, bliver anvendt til at analysere data og lave forudsigelser om antallet af tilfælde, tendenser og endda pandemiens afslutning. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmer håber forskere at opnå indsigt, der kan hjælpe med at håndtere og kontrollere udbruddet mere effektivt.
